message: Fixed CleanStackTraceTest and a NPE in ModuleInstance

Merge pull request #3 from eskatos/Applying_1.4_to_develop

Fixed CleanStackTraceTest and a NPE in ModuleInstance

o Overriding visitProperties() in EntityPropertiesInstance, as otherwise a NPE results when visiting the StateHolder of an entity.
o Removing unnecessary method parameters (identity), since EntityState contains the identity.

Applied patch for QI-41 (NPE in EntityCompositeInstance)

git-svn-id: https://scm.ops4j.org/repos/ops4j/projects/qi4j/core@11580 9b982a3c-3ae5-0310-a4bc-d9a3335569bd

message:
o Modularizing the RDF Indexer so we can have persisted and remote repositories.
o Added some more descriptive Exceptions for non-registered Composites/Entities/Services. Also, found one case where the UOW would throw a NPE instead of reporting a missing registration.
